description:
Ayanokoji`s class embarks on their first trial as the ascended Class C, the mixed training camp.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le principe de croissance le plus fort réside dans le choix humain
Nanika o Erabu Koto Koso ga, Seichou no Saidai no Kate to Naru
The Strongest Principle of Growth Lies in the Human Choice.
何かを選ぶことこそが, 成長の最大の糧となる
